Summary: Update nvme recovery test function to find the default server config path when run with systemd
Description:
get_server_config() is used to get the server config file and now the test is starting the server with systems that have default server config file /etc/daos/daos_server.yml.

The test needs to be fixed to have both ways so if user runs with systems or manually can find the server config file.
Creator: Samir Raval
